info.title: Real-Time Collaboration
info.description: Collaborate in real-time with multiple users, each maintaining independent views within the same 3D scene.

steps.title: Multi-User
steps.description: Multiple users can join the same 3D environment in real-time, each with independent camera controls.

steps.title: Synchronized Interaction
steps.description: Edits and actions are instantly visible to all participants, maintaining a persistent environment.
